name: SerperDevTool
description: Integrates with the Serper API to perform real-time web searches directly from Python applications, enabling agents to access up-to-date information from the internet.

expected_input.search_query: A string representing the search term or phrase.

expected_output: A list of search results, each containing a title, link, and snippet of the content.

name: ScrapeWebsiteTool
description: Extracts and reads the content of a specified website by making HTTP requests and parsing the received HTML, facilitating tasks like web scraping and data collection.

expected_input.website_url: A string specifying the URL of the website to be scraped.

expected_output: The textual content extracted from the specified website.
